text: Avarkalutaiya vakkurutiyai avarkal miriyatalum; allahvin vacanankalai avarkal nirakarittu vittatalum, aniyayamaka avarkal napimarkalaik kolai ceytatalum, "enkal itayankal tiraiyitappattullana." (Enave enta upatecamum anke cellatu) enru avarkal kuriyatalum, (allah avarkalaic capittu vittan;) avarkalutaiya nirakarippin karanattal allah (avarkalutaiya irutayankalin mitu) muttiraiyittuvittan. Akave avarkalil cilarait tavira (marravarkal) iman kolla mattarkal
